flawed_nl_solution:
Since Will was 4 years old 3 years ago, then he is 4+3 = <<4+3=10>>10 years old now
Dina is twice as old as he is so she is 2*10 = <<2*10=20>>20 years old now
In 5 years, Will will be 10+5 = <<10+5=15>>15 years old
In 5 years, Diane will be 20+5 = 25 years old
The sum of their ages at that time will be 15+25 = <<15+25=40>>40 years
#### 40

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
